text: This area contains the remians of the drownded dead; establish an outpost here to recruit local Coast units into your armies.
This area contains the remains of the recent and not so recent dead; establish an outpost here to recruit local Counts units into your armies.
This area contains the remains from civilizations long since forgotten; establish an outpost here to recruit local Nagashizzar units into your armies.
This area contains the remians of ancient nehekaran warriors; establish an outpost here to recruit local Nehekaran units into your armies.
This area contains a deposit of Warpstone, desired and treasured by Nagash
